Pre-Game Insights: Both teams are seeking their first points in the Copa America.
Ecuador lost their opening match 2-1 to Venezuela, while Jamaica lost 1-0 to Mexico.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ecuador will be without Enner Valencia due to a red card.
Jamaica's starting lineup includes Jahmali Waite in goal and Shamar Nicholson up front.
Others: The match is Ecuador's third straight opening match loss in the Copa America.
Jamaica has never scored a goal in their seven previous Copa America matches.
